project_name: Lake Erie operations with the 3G-ESP attached to a LR-AUV, August/September 2018
experiment_design_description: Samples were collected using a MBARI 3G-ESP attached to a LR-AUV. Extracted with Qiagen DNEasy Blood and Tissue kit. Amplified with NEXTFLEX 16S V4 Amplicon-Seq Kit 2.0 (customized to include Parada/Apprill modifications); full-length primers were: FWD:GACGCTCTTCCGATCTTATGGTAATTGTGTGYCAGCMGCCGCGGTAA; REV:TGTGCTCTTCCGATCTAGTCAGTCAGCCGGACTACNVGGGTWTCTAAT. Sequenced with Illumina MiSeq 2x300bp (600 cycles) v3 chemistry.
run_center: University of Michigan Advanced Genomics Core
